response.overview: in the final code steven seagal plays benny voss a retired intelligence officer drawn back  into the shadows when a rogue aI system threatens global security set across eastern europe  and the us the blends cyber warfare hand to hand combat and old school espionage as the digital threat  escalates seagal's character must decode a trail of encrypted clues while confronting ghost from his past with a cast  international  operatives and a ticking clock the final code delivers a gritty tech infused thriller that mark seagal's  return to high stakes action
response.title: the final code
